SEARCH
程序包 Controller

类 MainPanelController

java.lang.Object
Controller.MainPanelController
public class MainPanelController extends Object
Controller class responsible for managing the main content panel and its associated sub-panels in a financial management application. It handles the initialization, loading, and display of various panels such as Personal Center, Transaction System, Bill Statistics, Budget Management, AI Assistant, and Spending Star Whispers using a CardLayout.
版本:
1.0
作者:
19

  • 构造器详细资料

    • MainPanelController

      public MainPanelController(String username, JPanel contentPanel, PersonCenterController personCenterController, BillController billController, CardLayout cardLayout)
      Constructs a MainPanelController with the specified parameters.
      参数:
      username - The username of the logged-in user.
      contentPanel - The main JPanel that holds different sub-panels.
      personCenterController - Controller for the Personal Center panel.
      billController - Controller for the Bill Statistics panel.
      cardLayout - The CardLayout used to switch between panels.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initializeContentPanels

      public void initializeContentPanels()
      Initializes the content panels by adding placeholders or the Personal Center panel to the main content panel. The Personal Center panel is fully initialized, while others are represented by placeholders until loaded.

    • loadPanel

      private JPanel loadPanel(String name)
      Loads the specified panel dynamically based on its name. If the panel fails to load, a placeholder panel is returned.
      参数:
      name - The name of the panel to load.
      返回:
      The loaded JPanel or a placeholder if loading fails.

    • createPlaceholderPanel

      private JPanel createPlaceholderPanel(String name)
      Creates a placeholder panel with a centered label for panels that fail to load or are not yet implemented.
      参数:
      name - The name of the panel to display on the placeholder.
      返回:
      A JPanel with a placeholder label.

    • showPanel

      public void showPanel(String name)
      Displays the specified panel in the content panel using the CardLayout. If the panel is not loaded, it will be dynamically loaded. If it is a placeholder, it will be replaced with the actual panel.
      参数:
      name - The name of the panel to display.
